title: 3 main issues happen in Oceania cause this server sux
body:
1. Toxic players everywhere.
2. Server unstable.
3. Australia net is shit like a hell.

point 1, I don't have to explain, do I? coz they are everywhere, leaver, afker, troller, or using bot to be afk in AI game for free IP and exp...etc.
point 2, maybe because of point3, server become unstable but I'm not sure the real reason.
point 3, It is a no doubt fact. Although the average speed is slower than other countries, they can't even make it stable. And I can't see those companies try their best to improve it.

replies.body:
1. Happens on every server.
2. Happens on every server and actually its pretty stable on OCE, if you want to see a server that isn't stable to go EUW.
3. Australian net works just fine unless you have a shit provider, you having a shit provider is your fault for choosing a shitty provider so...

Shit provider is my fault? Provider provides unstable net RANDOM time, then how can I do with that? Had called them many times, and what they fixed only works for few months. How am I suppose to do? Although Aus net speed is slow, they can't even make it stable. TBH, every country have the worst net provider, and i believe the worst net provider in some countries such as America, England, German, Japan, Korean...etc. are still a lot better. it's more about how companies act. Do they improve themselves every year? or they only fix/ a bit upgrade when customers complain?

Like i already said...

>Australian net works just fine unless you have a shit provider, **you having a shit provider is your fault for choosing a shitty provider so**...
